original_title: Inside The Album with Graham Coxon from Blur - "Modern Life Is Rubbish"
overview: A breakdown of Modern Life is Rubbish, the second studio album by English alternative rock band Blur (released May 1993). The album is regarded as one of the defining releases of the Britpop scene.
title: Inside The Album with Graham Coxon from Blur - "Modern Life Is Rubbish"
